#summary KMLkpwn instruction manual.

= KMLkpwn instruction manual. =

All things good with KMLkpwn

= Details =

Good things will be listed here.

Its rather simple too ... 
Open kmlkpwn
Open your android wardrive kml file.
Magic stuff happens.
You can click the column headings to sort the rows.
You can filter down to the top 1000 ssids using the provided buttons.
You can remove ssids by typing them in the box and clicking either remove containing or remove exact.
    * Remove exact will look for exact ssid matches
    * Remove containing will look for ssids that contain the filter string.



= Notes =

KMLkpwn only works with wardrive.
KMLkpwn only works with windows.
